title: How to repent for MAJOR Sins? STEP BY STEP | assimalhakeem JAL
transcript: Abdul Bari from Ghana. Assalamu Alaikum Sheikh. Wa'alaykumussalam Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuh. Sheikh, please, if somebody commits a major sin, is there a special way for asking for forgiveness or when he says Astaghfirullah, Astaghfirullah, Astaghfirullah, it's enough or should he ponder on the sin? Major sins require repentance, which means that they have to stop doing the sin immediately. They have to intend not to do it in the future. They have to fill their hearts with remorse because without the remorse in the heart and the burning of the heart, of regret, there is no repentance accepted. And of course they have to ask Allah for forgiveness. Once they do this, Allah would forgive them.
